trans-unit.source: Query Strings
trans-unit.target: Query Strings

trans-unit.source: Query string operations for passing data to web applications.
trans-unit.target: Query string operations for passing data to web applications.

trans-unit.source: $skip and $top
trans-unit.target: $skip and $top

trans-unit.source: This operation is used for paging when performing any enumeration operation.
trans-unit.target: This operation is used for paging when performing any enumeration operation.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve a range of entities under your <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: You can retrieve a range of entities under your <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to retrieve the first five entities under your <token>servicensd</token>, you can issue the following command:
trans-unit.target: For example, if you want to retrieve the first five entities under your <token>servicensd</token>, you can issue the following command:

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>{skip}</codeInline> is the number of entries to skip, and <codeInline>{top}</codeInline> is the number of entries to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>{skip}</codeInline> is the number of entries to skip, and <codeInline>{top}</codeInline> is the number of entries to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: The <token>ac2</token> scope corresponding to the resource path is used to issue the token and the resource access is evaluated against the token with the path.
trans-unit.target: The <token>ac2</token> scope corresponding to the resource path is used to issue the token and the resource access is evaluated against the token with the path.

trans-unit.source: Upon requesting a token, the following string is returned from the <token>ac2</token> service:
trans-unit.target: Upon requesting a token, the following string is returned from the <token>ac2</token> service:

trans-unit.source: The token should be extracted.
trans-unit.target: The token should be extracted.

trans-unit.source: Because the token is URL-encoded, you must URL-decode it.
trans-unit.target: Because the token is URL-encoded, you must URL-decode it.

trans-unit.source: The decoded token must be put into a string similar to this:
trans-unit.target: The decoded token must be put into a string similar to this:

trans-unit.source: Please note the following:
trans-unit.target: Please note the following:

trans-unit.source: The received string is URI-decoded (%26 => &) and is in double quotes.
trans-unit.target: The received string is URI-decoded (%26 => &) and is in double quotes.

trans-unit.source: Put this into the <codeInline>HttpAuthorizationHeader</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Put this into the <codeInline>HttpAuthorizationHeader</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>ExpiresOn</codeInline> time in the middle of the string is specified as a Unix File Time (that is, the number of seconds since 01/01/1970 at 12:00am).
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>ExpiresOn</codeInline> time in the middle of the string is specified as a Unix File Time (that is, the number of seconds since 01/01/1970 at 12:00am).

trans-unit.source: You should scrub the <codeInline>identityprovider</codeInline>, <codeInline>audience</codeInline>, <codeInline>issuer</codeInline>, and <codeInline>hmacsha</codeInline> fields.
trans-unit.target: You should scrub the <codeInline>identityprovider</codeInline>, <codeInline>audience</codeInline>, <codeInline>issuer</codeInline>, and <codeInline>hmacsha</codeInline> fields.

trans-unit.source: The domain used when requesting a token uses the HTTP scheme, even though calls to the service are always issued over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: The domain used when requesting a token uses the HTTP scheme, even though calls to the service are always issued over HTTPS.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the content type in the HTTP header is of type: <codeInline>application/x-www-form-urlencoded</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the content type in the HTTP header is of type: <codeInline>application/x-www-form-urlencoded</codeInline>.
